name: Re:Mind
slogan: A smart jewellery for self-care and mindful moments reminders
description: A stylish wearable that looks like jewellery, produces regular reminders and helps people to build self-care and moments of awareness into daily routine and foster healthier habits.

jobs.title: Co-Founder / Partner for a smart jewellery start-up
jobs.description:
A solo founder is searching for co-founder or partner for a smart jewellery start-up.

**What is Re:Mind**

A stylish wearable that looks like jewellery, produces regular vibrating reminders and helps people to build self-care and moments of awareness into daily routine and foster healthier habits.

**Where I am at**

* there is an MVP mobile app for iOS and Android about to be released
* the website is published, but 'content' section still needs more work for the next 3-6 months
* the first work like prototype has been developed and now requires refining
* the look-like prototype / jewellery has been designed as well

Next steps:

* look for investment and support in the form of incubators and accelerators to join, or crowd funding and angels
* promote app and website, build community of supporters and other marketing and promotion efforts

If this is something you are prepared to be engaged with and feel interested in developing smart jewellery for self-care, mindfulness and wellbeing then please, do get in touch and let’s have a conversation.

And even if you are not prepared to take on the co-founder responsibilities, but would like to be part of the journey, I would love to hear from you as well.

**Requirements**

There is no ideal skill set or qualification for the partner as there are all too many aspects of developing the product where an extra pair of capable and devoted hands is required, but probably commercial or marketing experience at this stage would be most valuable.

My own experience and skills however sit within software development – team and project lead, product owner and business analyst. All the rest I’m learning and outsourcing as I go.

The partner's involvement can be either part-time or full time whatever suits them better. I have been bootstrapping so far and intend to continue working until Re:Mind is funded sufficiently. This is equity-based role at this stage.

As it’s quite early days, there will be a lot of hands on work requiring rolling up the sleeves and learning new skills, building partnerships and looking for funding and support. I need a down to earth, realistic and proactive partner, who understands what it takes to build a business, that there is risk and no safety cushions. Someone who’s prepared to be honest and open, willing to communicate and listen, and look for solutions together, share the responsibility for making decisions, acting on them and facing the consequences.
